alert.note: Alert for Kauai North; Kauai Southwest; Maui Central Valley North; Maui Windward West; Molokai North; Molokai West; Molokai Windward; Niihau; Oahu North Shore; Waianae Coast; Windward Haleakala (Hawaii) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Surf Advisory issued January 19 at 3:51PM HST until January 21 at 6:00AM HST by NWS Honolulu
info.description: ...HIGH SURF ADVISORY FOR NORTH AND WEST FACING SHORES OF NIIHAU KAUAI OAHU AND NORTH FACING SHORES OF MAUI... .A new long period northwest swell (320 degrees) will fill in tonight, peak Friday, before dropping below advisory levels Saturday. ...HIGH SURF ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM HST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Surf building to 15 to 20 feet along north facing shores. Surf building to 10 to 15 feet along west facing shores * WHERE...North and west facing shores of Niihau, Kauai, Oahu and north facing shores of Maui. * WHEN...Until 6 AM HST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Moderate. Strong breaking waves and strong currents will make swimming dangerous.
info.instruction: Head all advice from ocean safety officials. When in doubt, don`t go out.
